stringConfig.guildAdd:
Hey, %@! Thanks for adding me to your server **%@**!
> To get started, run the command `/%@` in your server!
stringConfig.dmReceived:
Thanks for the DM! Your complaint/issue/feedback has been logged!

*Note: If you're sending an image, make sure you include the link!*
stringConfig.noPermission: You don't have permission to use this command.
stringConfig.noSetup: To use this command, an admin must first do /boar-manage setup!
stringConfig.doingSetup: BoarBot is currently being set up! Please wait!
stringConfig.noGuild: This can only be used in a server!
stringConfig.onCooldown: You're using this command too fast! Please wait 5 seconds!
stringConfig.noAttachmentPerms: BoarBot doesn't have attachment permissions, so some interactive images may not appear.
stringConfig.error: Something went wrong! Please try again in a few minutes. If the issue persists, DM BoarBot with the issue!
stringConfig.maintenance: BoarBot is currently in maintenance mode!
stringConfig.setupError: An error occurred while getting information! Try again later.
stringConfig.setupFinishedAll: BoarBot has successfully been set up! Do /boar daily in one of the boar channels you chose to get started.
stringConfig.setupExpired: You haven't interacted with the form for 2 minutes! Automatically terminating setup.
stringConfig.setupUnfinished1:
**What channel can be used for trading?** 
*(Note: Threads will dynamically be created in this channel.)*
stringConfig.setupUnfinished2:
**What channels can BoarBot commands be used in? [Max 3]** 
*(Note: If you have a lot of server members, these channels may get flooded.)*
stringConfig.setupUnfinished3: **Is this server a Hypixel Skyblock community?**
stringConfig.setupFinished1: **The channel you're using for trading is: **
stringConfig.setupFinished2: **These are the channels you've selected for BoarBot to work in: **
stringConfig.setupInfoResponse1: This bot has a trading system! In order for the trading system to work properly, it needs its own channel. Threads will dynamically be created and deleted in this channel unless the bot doesn't have permission to do so. If this is the case, trading will unfortunately be automatically disabled. This channel can be changed at any time using /boar-manage setup. Use the pencil button to enter a channel ID (right-click channel name, Copy ID) that isn't shown in the select box.
stringConfig.setupInfoResponse2: This bot has slash commands, which can produce spammy content depending on how large your server is, so you'll need to decide which channel(s) the bot is enabled in. These channels can be changed at any time using /boar-manage setup. Use the pencil button to enter a channel ID (right-click channel name, Copy ID) that isn't shown in the select box.
stringConfig.setupInfoResponse3: This bot originated on a Discord server dedicated to Hypixel Skyblock. If you don't know what that is, no sweat! Just click "No". If you do and you're part of the community, it's highly recommended that you click "Yes". This can be changed at any time using /boar-manage setup.
stringConfig.dailyUsed: You've already used your daily boar! The next time you can use the command is
stringConfig.dailyNoBoarFound: Failed to find one or more valid boars!
stringConfig.giveBoar: Successfully given boar (If it didn't show, make sure perms are correct!)
stringConfig.giveBadID: ID input is not valid. To see valid IDs, wait for choices to appear.
stringConfig.giveBadge: Successfully given badge (If it didn't show, make sure perms are correct!)
stringConfig.giveBadgeHas: This user already has this badge!
stringConfig.collEnhanceDetails: This action will take your %@ and convert it into a random boar of the next rarity. The result of this interaction is shown above. Click "Enhance" again to confirm.
stringConfig.collGiftDetails: has sent out a %@! These gifts include boars, boar bucks, other powerups, and exclusive items. Be the first to click "Claim" to claim it!
stringConfig.giftFail: BoarBot is missing permissions needed to send gifts!
stringConfig.powRightFull: %@ It took you %@ms to guess correctly! Wait for the powerup to end to see your placement.
stringConfig.powTopOneResponse: You had a time of %@ms, putting you in the Top 1%! You received %@!
stringConfig.powTopTenResponse: You had a time of %@ms, putting you in the Top 10%! You received %@!
stringConfig.powTopFiftyResponse: You had a time of %@ms, putting you in the Top 50%! You received %@!
stringConfig.powNoRewardResponse: You had a time of %@ms, putting you outside any bracket that gives rewards. Better luck next time!
stringConfig.notInBoard: The user you entered isn't on this leaderboard! Defaulting to first page.
stringConfig.notValidChannel:
This channel isn't valid! Try a different one! The channel should be:
- A text channel
- Not already chosen
- Exists in this server

boar.name: boar
boar.description: Commands to play and interact with BoarBot

collection.name: collection
collection.description: View your collection of daily boars

args.name: user
args.description: Check someone else's collection of boars

args.name: view
args.description: What view to start off in (Normal, Detailed, Powerups)

args.name: page
args.description: Page to start off on. Accepts boar names.

modals.title: Input Page Number or Boar Name

top.name: top
top.description: View leaderboards showcasing a ranking of player stats

args.name: user
args.description: The user to find on the leaderboard

args.name: page
args.description: The page to start out on

args.name: view
args.description: What view to start off in (Overview, Buy/Sell, Your Orders)

args.name: page
args.description: The page to start out on

modals.title: Input Page Number or Boar/Item Name

setup.name: setup
setup.description: Set BoarBot up to your liking

boarDev.name: boar-dev
boarDev.description: Commands exclusive to developers of BoarBot

args.name: user
args.description: User you'd like to give the item to

emojiFind.name: Emoji Find
emojiFind.description: Click the emoji that's different from the others!

tiny1.name: Tiny Boar
tiny1.description: What boar is mentioned in Tiny Boar's description?

explosionless1.name: Explosionless Boar
explosionless1.description: What adjective describes Explosionless Boar's potential explosivity?

chocolate1.name: Chocolate Boar
chocolate1.description: What year was Chocolate Boar pulled off shelves?

matrix1.name: Matrix Boar
matrix1.description: What color pill does Matrix Boar keep taking?

fast.name: Quick Click
fast.description: Be the first to click the green button!

normal.name: Normal Boar
normal.description: The origin of all boars. Quite unremarkable.

explosionless.name: Explosionless Boar
explosionless.description: Its mind was blown so hard that it refuses to ignite anymore. If it ever does, though, it's assumed its explosion would be... cataclysmic.

tiny.name: Tiny Boar
tiny.description: The result of an experiment gone wrong with the Wizard Boar. Has come to terms with its condition by living with ants.

carrot.name: Carrot Boar
carrot.description: On the surface, it's indistinguishable from the grass around it. The only one capable of spotting them is Farmer Boar.

buff.name: Buff Boar
buff.description: It's said this boar can crush rocks with its bare hands. Stuck in a toxic relationship with Coffee Girl Boar simply for appearances.

chocolate.name: Chocolate Boar
chocolate.description: A discontinued chocolate bar from 1999. It was pulled off shelves after traces of boar meat were discovered inside it.

emo.name: Emo Boar
emo.description: Is said to be so emotional and sensitive that it can feel the emotions of those around them. Its parents say it's a phase, but it most definitely is not.

matrix.name: Matrix Boar
matrix.description: Keeps taking Acetaminophen because of its red color. Believes it's its destiny to save humanity from its AI overlords.

soda.name: Soda Boar
soda.description: After much engineering and toil, scientists created this boar, which replaces the signature explosion with a constant stream of soda.

clown.name: Clown Boar
clown.description: It is said that this boar was directly modeled after someone that posted cringe on the internet.

sphere.name: Sphere Boar
sphere.description: After many millennia of the concretion process, this boar took the form of a perfect sphere. What's at its core? Nobody knows.

killer.name: Killer Boar
killer.description: Has a thirst for killing that must be sated every night. If it isn't, chaos is bound to ensue.

fish.name: Boarfish
fish.description: A highly invasive fish species. It has a friendly personality around humans but vicious predatory instincts for other fish in its environment.

fruit.name: Fruit Boar
fruit.description: This boar is part of a cult with shape-shifting abilities. Instead of doing anything cool, though, they only shape shift into various fruits.

rainy.name: Rainy Boar
rainy.description: Cursed by the God of All Boars for something unspeakable, this boar constantly has a rain cloud pouring down around it. Lightning smites it at random intervals.

golden.name: Golden Boar
golden.description: This boar is rumored to be buried deep in the treasures of the Mines of Divan. Since it's 100% pure gold, jewelers use it as a standard for gold quality.

creepy.name: Creepy Boar
creepy.description: Looks strikingly similar to a normal boar at first glance, but is actually a paranormal being that lives in the skin of recently perished boars.

robot.name: RoboBoar-9000
robot.description: A sentient robot capable of overthrowing the human race but simply decides not to. Matrix Boar is convinced they're up to something nefarious but can't prove it.

coffee.name: Coffee Girl Boar
coffee.description: Rarely seen not drinking coffee. When she's not, she's typically getting her nails done or posting a selfie of herself on social media.

moon.name: Moon Boar
moon.description: Moon Boar is actually just the other side of the Moon that we can't see. NASA spends billions a year to keep the secret from getting out.

necron.name: Necron Boar
necron.description: One of the five Wither Boars residing on the fifth floor of the Catacombs. Releases nuclear energy inside its body to prevent invaders from seeing its King.

wizard.name: Wizard Boar
wizard.description: Cheated its way to an Honors Boarwarts diploma. It now performs street magic to pay its bills as it never learned how to actually cast spells.

aurora.name: Aurora Boarealis
aurora.description: People travel across the world to see its beauty. It only appears when Moon Boar is eclipsing the sun.

minimumwage.name: Minimum Wage Boar
minimumwage.description: One of the smartest boars in the universe. Nobody's quite sure why it works at a fast food restaurant, but there must be a reason.

backrooms.name: Backrooms Boar
backrooms.description: This boar fell into the backrooms while recording a skateboarding montage with its friends. Neither it nor the walls around it seem to age.

jumpscare.name: Jumpscare Boar
jumpscare.description: Shoves its face into peoples' doorbell cameras to make them think it's a Creepy Boar. Creepy Boars abuse this to find new victims.

cowboy.name: Cowboar
cowboy.description: Unparalleled skills when it comes to the lasso and piloting horses. Refuses to touch any modern technology.

realistic.name: Realistic Boar
realistic.description: A taxidermy of a boar that came before the current generation of boars. To have it appeal to modern society, they had to make its head explode.

farmer.name: Farmer Boar
farmer.description: Harvests Carrot Boars to sell to Cowboar. Lives a mundane, yet comforting life with a wife and kids.

rickroll.name: Rickroll Boar
rickroll.description: Spreads the word of the God of All Boars. He'll never give you up, nor will he let you down. He'll never run around and... desert you.

morbius.name: Boarbius
morbius.description: A boar whose sense of humor is exclusive to April and May of 2022. Thinks Morbius is the greatest movie of all time.

god.name: God of All Boars
god.description: Created all boars in the universe. While it may seem like a divine being, it's actually just an albino boar hellbent on artificially creating new boar species.

imposter.name: Imposter Boar
imposter.description: Kills its crew mates on the International Boar Station and frames it as a spacewalking accident. Its kill count is said to be in the dozens.

curious.name: Curious Boarge
curious.description: With the extinction of all apes, a new mascot for the classic children's book was needed to appeal to modern society.

gamebreaker.name: Gameboarker
gamebreaker.description: This boar takes explosion to a whole other level, fusing its cells with gunpowder to create bigger explosions. Awarded to those who find and report several bugs.

racer.name: Racer Boar
racer.description: The fastest boar of all time. Races in a car to make it fair to others. Awarded to those who obtain the first edition of any non-special boar.

early_supporter.name: Early Subboarter
early_supporter.description: Anyone with this badge boosted in the server BoarBot originated in!

hunter.name: Boar Hunter
hunter.description: Those that obtain ALL unique boars get this badge!

artist.name: Boartist
artist.description: If you made your own boar and it made it into BoarBot, you get this badge!

athlete.name: Boarthlete
athlete.description: Only those that are #1 on any leaderboard receive this badge!

multiBoost.name: Multiplier Boost
multiBoost.description: Boosts your multiplier by adding to its current value, making it more likely to get rarer boars when you do /boar daily.

gift.name: Boar Gift
gift.description: A gift that you can be sent to and opened by other people. Contains boar bucks, boars, rare surprises, and more.

extraChance.name: Extra Boar Chance
extraChance.description: Increases your chance of getting an extra boar when you do /boar daily. Capped at 300%. Multiplier boosts apply to all extra boars.

enhancer.name: Boar Enhancer
enhancer.description: Can be used to enhance a boar to a random boar of the next rarity. Capped at 16. Divine is the maximum rarity that can be enhanced.
